customer_reviews.title: Firm, sleepworthy, cloth 8" futon mattress
customer_reviews.text: This full-size futon mattress perfectly fit my standard futon frame. It is covered in a soft but sturdy fabric and is firm enough to feel comfortable sitting or laying on it. I chose this one because it appeared to have a softer cover than those described as covered in "canvas", a firm but comfortable feel, and an 8" thickness so that guests sleeping on it would feel like they were in a bed, not on a couch. All of these things are very true about the Artiva 8" futon mattress. I am 100% thrilled with this mattress; and, in fact, I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Springs=uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: When we first received this it was thick & amazing! Everyone who tried it said it was so comfortable, I was really proud of my purchase! However, for two hundred dollars I really expected it to last longer than six months! We can feel the springs & the futon bars. This is the first one we've purchased, the one that came with the futon lasted us Six years! Now I understand why springs are such a bad idea, lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: PerplCush

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived so fast it was absolutely amazing!! I appreciated how well it was wrapped for shipping so that it didn’t tear or get damaged. When we opened it it laid right out and wasn’t stuck or bent in any odd shape. It’s made with good quality material and is much more comfortable than any other futon mattresses I’ve had to sleep on before. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this to someone looking for a good quality futon mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen D. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, unless you weigh 50lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, and reviews were all positive buy all that reviewed it must of weight 50lbs so they never felt the SPRINGS like I did all the time. This was a big waste of time. Why can't they put enough cotton in these things to separate the springs from the seat. I weight about 185 lbs and the springs never left my bottom's awareness. Maybe this one got through the inspectors, I don't know but it was just horrible.
